title: Adele enjoys night out amid claims Joe Wicks helped her 'shed' 3 stone
text:
Adele enjoyed a night out with friends complete with drink in hand (Picture: Backgrid)

Adele enjoyed a night out with friends on Friday amid reports that a routine of reformer pilates and Joe Wick’s intense workout videos helped her to ‘shed’ three stone.

The acclaimed singer wowed fans with her new look as she partied with Drake for his 34th birthday earlier in the week, before taking to Instagram to joke that she has decided to ‘sweat’ her feelings out instead of crying; Adele is divorcing her husband of two years Simon Konecki, who is also the father of her son.

Adele and pals visited Malibu restaurant Nobu on Friday, and the Someone Like You singer was spotted surrounded by security as she snuck her way out of the restaurant at the end of the evening – with what appeared to be an iced drink in hand.

Our kinda gal.

Our kinda gal (Picture: Backgrid)

A source close to the British singer claimed that Adele has a ‘new lease of life’ after a long year.

‘Adele has been out enjoying herself and she sees that as her priority at the moment, along with being a mum to Angelo,’ they said.

Adele has a ‘new lease of life’ after a long year (Picture: Backgrid)

‘She has been loving her new workout regime and it really works for her,’ the insider added.

‘It’s a bonus that she has shifted some weight. Her mates are glad she’s letting loose and there’s nothing but good feelings towards her.’

It is thought that the 31-year-old has reportedly shunned the gym and ‘secretly followed’ Joe’s intense workout videos from the comfort of her own home as well as hiring the help of a personal trainer.

We’re just hoping this ‘new lease of life’ leads to some new music.
